document_data.name: Aldolphus
document_data.mainbody:
'''Aldolphus the Stout''' ({{Pronounce|al|DOL|fuss|refs=}}) was a sage in [[Arabel]] in [[Cormyr]] in [[1357 DR]].
{{Quote|Curious happenstances abound—and all burning Hell breaks loose.|Phrase coined by Aldolphus.}}
document_data.Activities:
Aldolphus loved astronomical studies but his primary field was the physical sciences: the identification and usage of minerals, woods, and plants.

Aldolphus fled Arabel during the [[Time of Troubles]] and settled in [[Urmlaspyr]] in [[Sembia]].
document_data.Description: Aldolphus was a stout, joyous man who didn't have the pomposity same of his fellow sages.
document_data.Relationship: Aldolphus was a good friend of King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]], who always visited the sage when traveling in Arabel. Aldolphus was particularly fond of the meals they shared together.
